attributes.contentHtml:
Hello, I was a friend of Wajfay till 2022 June, let's take this to his early hostings, such as ownodes.org, I was a CEO there, he was so kinda a scumbag such as spamming and typing all in caps, an example:

Also totally a professional at hostings



Afterwards, I blocked him and it was for about 2 months, after unblocking everything was fine. He had a new hosting nighspeed.com (the reviews of it, even has an alert "Weâ€™ve detected a number of fake reviews for this company and weâ€™ve removed them."). On 11 November 2022, we found out he was redistributing our addon to other members, so we decided to get rid of him completly, afterwards he came here and made a thread. In the thread he was admitting to leaking the addon, ddosing us and drama.gg and making up an alt - Mubeeeen & newtonzz to cover up the evidence. That fortunatly didn't work for them and there was nothing heard back. Till his new hosting is here wajpad.club. When we recently heard about it, we were suprised on how much he really abuses. First seeing it, he was using deinserverhost.de, he was making the counts so high which is obviously not true

Anyways after so long, it is gone from deinserverhost.de (confirmation of it (saved page)) but not totally, now he is using Hetzner (proof), now it is a waiting game for the end of him

Some other screenshots


Shoutout to staff at drama.gg and deinserverhost.de
